column2: High Curcumin Lakadong Turmeric Powder - Directly sourced from the organic farmers of Lakadong Village - East and West Jantia Hills of Meghalaya
column10: Lakadong turmeric, considered the best turmeric in the world, has the highest curcumin content of minimum 8%.  It has a distinct aromatic flavor and light brown colour compared to ordinary varieties of turmeric.                                                                                                                                                                                                           This product is ethically sourced through farmer’s groups in the Lakadong village. handpicked, sorted and washed three to four times, then sliced into small pieces and  sun dried and  powdered in small batches. This turmeric is not oil extracted, is 100 % free from any kind of pesticides, additives or preservatives.

column2: Travancore Nutmeg Powder - Organically Grown, Single origin & Homestead produce
column10:
Finest quality Travancore Nutmeg sourced from an organic certified farmer at Moolankavu village of Sulthan Bathery at Wayanad, in Kerala with authentic source certification details. Product is handpicked in small batches and hygienically packed as per stringent quality standards.
100% natural and organically grown local variety. No hybrid variety is sourced. No preservatives, additives or flavours added.
Nutmeg is used in skincare for its anti-microbial and anti-inflammatory properties. It helps in detoxifying the body, clearing out toxins from the liver and kidneys.
It is also good for digestive issues such as constipation, gas trouble etc. It is helpful for dental care. It is used in puddings, cookies and spice cakes etc.

column2: Allspice Powder (Gourmet Grade Spice Powder) - (Jamaican Pepper powder) - Ground allspice from organically grown, single origin homestead produce)
column10:
Single origin, organically grown and homestead produce of an organic and fair trade certified farmer in Wayand, Kerala. Freshly handpicked allspice berries are hygienically  powdered  in small batches as per international quality standards.
100% pesticide and chemical free, free from any kind of preservatives or additives.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Allspice has a unique flavour combination of pepper, clove, cinnamon and nutmeg.  Allspice powder can be sprinkled on cakes, desserts, preserves and fruit pies,  in  Seasoning blends  for meats, fish,  soups, stews and curries.

column2: Dry Ginger Powder (Organically grown & Single origin produce)
column10:
Premium gourmet quality spice powder sourced from an organic and fair trade certified farmer in Wayanad, Kerala. This is a local variety called ‘Maran’                                                                                                                                                                                       Fresh ginger root skin is peeled, washed three times, sliced, solar dried , and then powdered.
0% pesticide/  insecticide/ fungicide free. Free of preservatives, and added flavours.                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Ginger is a immunity booster.  Dried ginger powder is used in spices and masalas for gravies, curries, marinades, stews.

column2: Cardamom Seeds Powder (Organically grown, Single origin & Homestead produce)
column10:
Single origin, organically grown, pesticide free and homestead produce from the world’s best spice- producing mountain ranges- the Western Ghats of India.
100% natural, no colour, preservatives or additives added. Gluten Free | Vegan | Non-GMO | Non-ETO |Non –irradiated.
Only fresh harvest is sourced in small batches  from a certified organic farmer in Idukki, Kerala.
Cardamom is widely used as a flavouring agent in desserts, beverages, sausage, vegetable dishes and savoury meat and fish recipes.

column2: Fresh ground True cinnamon (Cinnamomum verum) (Organically grown, Single origin & homestead produce from Kerala)
column10:
True Cinnamon of finest quality, organically grown, single origin, homestead produce of  organic and fair trade certified farmers in Wayanad, Kerala
Fresh cinnamon bark is handpicked, carefully sorted, shade- dried,  powdered fine and packed in lock glass jars/tins to retain maximum flavour.
This cinnamon powder is true, and not cassia. True cinnamon powder has very delicate mild sweet flavor, is light brown or tan brown colour. Cassia powder is very dark brown colour and has very hot, spicy and pungent smell

Indian long pepper is widely used in ayurvedic medicines. It improves appetite, digestion, stomachache and diarrhea. It is also used for lung problems such as asthma, bronchitis, cough, throat pain and fever.  It has good anti-septic and anti-biotic properties

column2: RAW WHOLE FLAX SEEDS – FIBRE RICH SUPERFOOD for Weight Loss
column10:

Nutritional Value: Eating two tablespoons of ground flax seed a day will provide about 20 percent to 25 percent of your fiber needs. It gives 3.6 g of plant-based omega-3s, 75 calories, 2.6 grams of protein, 4 grams of carbohydrates (mostly fiber) and 6 grams of fat. Its essential fatty acids keep skin, nails, and hair shiny and healthy.                                                                                                                                                                                             Flaxseed help in regulating blood sugar, promoting weight loss, preventing constipation, help reduce LDL cholesterol levels,  the risk of cardiovascular disease and certain types of cancer, like prostate cancer and breast cancer.   As appetite suppressant, aids in Weight Loss
Improves Heart Health& Regulates Blood Sugar Level: Diets rich in flaxseed omega-3s help prevent hardening of the arteries and keep plaque from being deposited in the arteries partly by keeping white blood cells from sticking to the blood vessels’ inner linings and thus prevents the risk of heart diseases.

column10: Watermelon seeds are low in calories. A handful of seeds weighs about 4 grams but contains only 23 calories. Being rich in magnesium, they healthy metabolism of the body. column10: Referred to it as the “mother of all grains”, can be used and consumed instead of  other grain in place of rice, semolina, wheat.  When cooked, quinoa is soft and fluffy, with a slightly nutty taste. It can also be made into flour for making various foods like pasta and bread.

column2: RAW PREMIUM WHITE CHIA SEEDS - for weight loss

One ounce (28 grams) of chia seeds has 12 grams of carbs and fiber. They may reduce your risk of heart disease.  This humble superfood can also fight ageing, soothe inflammation, reduce acne scars and keep skin radiant and healthy.

column2: High Curcumin Lakadong Turmeric Powder - Directly sourced from the organic farmers of Lakadong Village - East and West Jantia Hills of Meghalaya
column10:
Considered  the best turmeric in the world, Lakadong turmeric  has the highest curcumin content about 8%
It has a distinct aromatic flavor and light brown colour compared to ordinary varieties of turmeric. Handpicked turmeric is sorted and washed three to four times,  sliced it into small pieces, sun dried and then powdered in small batches. Our turmeric is not oil extracted.
100 % free of pesticides, additives or preservatives. Non- GMO, Non-ETO, Vegan, Non-irradiated & Gluten free.
This product is ethically sourced through farmer’s groups in the Lakadong village, Meghalaya.

column2: Dry Ginger Powder (Organically grown & Single origin produce) Adrak Root Powder /Saunth Powder
column10:
Sourced from an organic and fair trade certified farmer in Wayanad, Kerala and made in small batches. Authentic, locally sourced, Non-GMO variety of ginger root  called ‘Maran’ is used to make the powder. No hybrid variety is used. Fresh ginger root skin is peeled, washed three times, sliced  and dried in solar dryer.  0% free of pesticides, insecticides, fungicides, preservatives. No  flavours added.
An immunity booster. Best with turmeric latte. Dried ginger powder is used in spices and masalas for gravies, curries, marinades, stews, for spicing food and beverages & seasoning meats.

column2: Ginger Coffee Powder - 250 gm
column10:
Ingredients: Dry Ginger Powder, Malabar Black Pepper Powder, Arabica Coffee Powder, Palm Jaggery Powder, Tulsi Powder, Coriander Powder, Long Pepper Powder, Cumin, Cardamom, Black Cardamom, Fenugreek and Salt
This Ayurvedic home  recipe  is a traditional healthy coffee of South India, especially Kerala, made by brewing dry ginger with coffee powder. It is commonly used as an effective remedy for cough, sore throat, fever and indigestion.Directions to use: Add 1 teaspoon of Ginger Coffee Powder in a glass of water and boil for two minutes. Stir well and serve hot.
